comments:
Build: WTP2.0.1 RC3-20070919174901

Steps to reproduce:

1. Choose any xml file, bring up the properties page for it, and make the file read-only.
2. Open the xml file in the xml editor.
3. Add an element
--> Dialog appears prompting you to make it writable.
4. Select yes.
--> You'll get the trace in the error log, shown below.
--> The element is not added.

Related bug155187?

The timing in which we respond to the validate edit request with respect to the order of documentChanged() events is causing the DocumentLineDiffer to complain about two different about to change notifications without a changed notification.
